name: EU DSGVO Helper
author: Eric Marten

sections.description:
This Plugin will be further developed. It so far caches google webfonts locally and replaces youtube embeded videos with a preview-image which becomes an embeded video on-click. More functions will be added soon.

Arbitrary section

This plugin is very easy to use.

A brief Markdown Example

  • Locally Caches Webfonts
  • Replaces Youtube embeded Videos with its preview image
sections.installation: Upload to plugin-directory and activate or use in mu-plugins
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Upload to plugin-directory and activate or use in mu-plugins

What to configure?

Nothing

What about foo bar?

Answer to foo bar dilemma.
